            <entry>cahi1:data_549943ee81509b957153169ceeda388363432826</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces on a cyclist in vertical and tilted positions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte auf einem Radfahrer in der Vertikale und 
in gekippten Positionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces sur un cycliste dans la verticale et les 
positions inclinées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças em um cyclist no vertical e em posições
inclinadas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze su un cyclist nel verticale e nelle 
posizioni inclinate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις σε έναν ποδηλάτη στις κάθετες και γαρμένες 
θέσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas en un cyclist en vertical y posiciones 
inclinadas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the forces acting on a cyclist moving in vertical (top) and tilted (bottom) positions.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cyclist</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equilibrium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pivot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die Kräfte, die auf 
einem Radfahrer fungieren, der in der Vertikale (Oberseite) umzieht 
und in gekippten (unteren) Positionen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent les forces agissant 
sur un cycliste se déplaçant dans la verticale (dessus) et les 
positions (inférieures) inclinées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram as forças que agem 
em um cyclist que move-se no vertical (alto) e em posições 
(inferiores) inclinadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano le forze che si 
comportano su un cyclist che si muove nel verticale (parte superiore) 
e nelle posizioni (inferiori) inclinate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν τις δυνάμεις 
ενεργώντας σε έναν ποδηλάτη που κινείται στις κάθετες (κορυφή) 
και γαρμένες (κατώτατες) θέσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran las fuerzas que 
actúan en un cyclist que se mueve en la vertical (tapa) y posiciones 
(inferiores) inclinadas.</string>
          </description>
